definition: mostly North American freshwater fishes with a thick-lipped mouth for feeding by suction
details:
noun
- mostly North American freshwater fishes with a thick-lipped mouth for feeding by suction
- an organ specialized for sucking nourishment or for adhering to objects by suction
- hard candy on a stick
= example: hard candy on a stick
= synonyms: lollipop, all-day sucker
- flesh of any of numerous North American food fishes with toothless jaws
- a person who is gullible and easy to take advantage of
= synonyms: mark
- a drinker who sucks (as at a nipple or through a straw)
- a shoot arising from a plant's roots
